competitive_edge.headline: More Than Just Daycare
competitive_edge.description: A learning environment designed around your child's growth.

items.a: Monday through Friday, 6:30am to 6:30pm. Flexible drop-off and pick-up.
Infants: 1:3. Toddlers: 1:5. Pre-K: 1:8. Well below state requirements.
Yes. We accept state childcare subsidies and offer sibling discounts.
Our kitchen is nut-free. We accommodate all dietary restrictions and allergies with advance notice.
